Keywords: Cosmic , Herald
Real Name: Uatu
Special Powers
I AM...THE WATCHER: The Watcher's lines of fire are never blocked. At the beginning of your turn, you may turn The Watcher's dial to any click.

July 15, 2022
Gensan
For the purposes of reference. "For the purposes of this effect, a set will be determined by the set symbol on the character�s base. Each set symbol must be different in order for Collector�s effect to apply. This means Fast Forces characters will be considered different from their main set characters since the set symbols are different. All exclusive figures have the WK (WizKids) set symbol, so they would all count as being from the same set. Legacy Card characters will use the set symbol printed on their base."
July 15, 2022
hoojeebo
It's the symbol. So yes, the Starter and the main set are considered the same set.

[B][COLOR="Sienna"]It depends what constitutes a set in the rules. Is it by set name or is it by set symbol on the base? If it is set symbol, then Collector would not get the bonus from his trait as they share a set symbol.[/COLOR][/B]
